message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to offer it to you at a price of $13,000. I think this is a great value considering its worth to you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but $13,000 is a bit high for me. Would you consider $10,000?

Hi Bob, I understand that $13,000 might be a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you at a price of $12,500. I think this is a fair compromise considering its value to you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit. How about we split the difference between our last two offers and settle at $11,250?
Hi Bob, I'm willing to consider your offer, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $11,250 just yet. I'm willing to come down a bit more. How about I offer you the product at $11,750?
Hi Alice, you're getting closer!  I'm willing to bump my offer up a little. How about $11,400?
Hi Bob, I'm glad you're willing to bump up your offer! I'm willing to meet you in the middle again. How about I offer you the product at $11,550?
